SUMMARY: Verify that images of product are displayed correctly.
Requirements:
1. Browser opened
2. Internet connection
3. URL entered
Test Step:
1. Keep Scrolling the home page
2. Click on a product from the home page
Expected Outcome:
1. Product images should be shown correctly
2. Images will be enlarged on mouse hover
Actual Outcome: Images shown but zoom-in effect not working
